document.full_text: navigation was halted on thursday in a key canal in the st. lawrence seaway after a vessel veered off course and became grounded, seaway management corp said.
document.title: ship grounds in canada-us seaway, traffic halted
lines_and_colors: navigation was halted on thursday in a key canal in the st. lawrence seaway after a vessel veered off course and became grounded, seaway management corp said.
